file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-71-01-04 - FORWARD ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR-WARNING MICROSWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FORWARD ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR-WARNING MICROSWITCH - REMOVAL/ INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the microswitch of the warning system of the forward electronic compartment door. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FORWARD ELECTRONIC COMPART- ALL 52-71-01-000-801-A MENT DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCH - REMOVAL FORWARD ELECTRONIC COMPART- ALL 52-71-01-400-801-A MENT DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCH - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-71-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-71-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FORWARD ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCH - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the microswitch of the warning system of the forward electronic compartment door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113/114 113CZ Forward Electronic Compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward Electronic Compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the COMPT circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. (2) Open access door 113CZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the electrical connector (1). (2) Remove the two screws (4) that attach the microswitch assembly (2) to the support (3) on the floor of the forward electronic compartment. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-71-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Remove the microswitch assembly (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-71-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Microswitch - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A ZONES 113 DET. A 114 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR DET. B 2. MICROSWITCH ASSEMBLY (S7249) 3. SUPPORT 4. SCREW (2) 145AMM520125.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-71-01 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-71-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. FORWARD ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCH - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the microswitch of the warning system of the forward electronic compartment door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - FORWARD ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT-DOOR AMM TASK 52-71-00-700-801-A/500 WARNING - OPERATIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113/114 113CZ Forward Electronic Compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward Electronic Compartment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the microswitch assembly (2) in its installation position on the support (3) on the floor of the forward electronic compartment. (2) Install the two screws (4) to attach the microswitch assembly (2) to the support (3). (3) Connect the electrical connector (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-71-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the COMPT circuit breaker and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (2) Do an operational test of the microswitch of the warning system of the forward electronic compartment door ( AMM TASK 52-71-00-700-801-A/500). (3) Close the access door 113CZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-71-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
